xml.name: version
xml.version_command: echo $(R --version | grep version | grep -v GNU)", seurat version" $(R --vanilla --slave -e "library(seurat); cat(sessionInfo()\$otherPkgs\$seurat\$Version)" 2> /dev/null | grep -v -i "WARNING: ")

param.name: genes_use
param.label: Genes to use
param.help: A file with gene names to use in construction of SNN graph if building directly based on expression data rather than a dimensionally reduced representation (i.e. PCs).

param.name: dims_use
param.label: PCA Dimensions to use
param.help: Number of PCs (dimensions) to use in construction of the SNN graph.
